faqs.question: Are there any affordable housing options available near Golf Course Road
faqs.answer: Golf Course Road is predominantly a luxury and premium housing market. True affordable housing, as defined by government schemes, is not typically found directly on this stretch. faqs.answer: Security is a paramount feature of residential living on Golf Course Road. Many complexes also feature dedicated panic buttons and integrated home automation systems for enhanced personal safety.

faqs.answer: Due to the significant infrastructure upgrades, including extensive drainage systems and elevated road networks implemented over the past decade, Golf Course Road has drastically improved its resilience to heavy rainfall.
